sentences.english: Before singing, he noodled at his guitar.
sentences.chinese: 唱歌之前他先弹了几下吉他。

sentences.english: He strummed his guitar when he talked to me.
sentences.chinese: 他和我说话时把吉他拨弄响了。

detailed_translations.english: a musical instrument usually with six strings that you play by pulling the strings with your fingers or with a  plectrum (= small piece of plastic, metal etc )

sentences.english: She can sing beautifully.
sentences.chinese: 她唱歌很好听。

sentences.english: Most children enjoy singing.
sentences.chinese: 大多数孩子都喜欢唱歌。

sentences.english: We had a great time singing some of the old songs .
sentences.chinese: 我们唱了一些老歌，非常开心。

sentences.english: I’ve never been able to sing in tune (= sing the correct notes ) .
sentences.chinese: 我唱歌总是跑调。

sentences.english: She patiently sang the baby to sleep .
sentences.chinese: 她耐心地唱歌哄宝宝入睡。

detailed_translations.english: to produce a musical sound with your voice

sentences.english: Let’s go swimming this afternoon.
sentences.chinese: 今天下午我们游泳去吧。

sentences.english: kids learning to swim the backstroke
sentences.chinese: 学习仰泳的孩子们

sentences.english: She was the first woman to swim the Channel.
sentences.chinese: 她是第一个游过英吉利海峡的女性。

detailed_translations.english: to move yourself through water using your arms and legs
a period of time that you spend swimming

sentences.english: Come on, let’s dance.
sentences.chinese: 来吧，我们跳舞吧。

sentences.english: The words danced before her tired eyes.
sentences.chinese: 这些字在她疲乏的眼前晃动。

sentences.english: The waltz is an easy dance to learn.
sentences.chinese: 华尔兹这种舞很容易学。

detailed_translations.english: to move your body to the sound and rhythm of music
a special set of movements performed to a particular type of music

sentences.english: Katie had drawn a cottage with a little stream running next to it.
sentences.chinese: 凯蒂画了一间小茅舍，旁边流淌着一条小溪。

sentences.english: She asked the little girl to draw a picture of the man she’d spoken to.
sentences.chinese: 她让小女孩把刚才和她说话的那个男人画出来。

sentences.english: Keith was drawing a complicated-looking graph.
sentences.chinese: 基思在画一张看上去很复杂的图表。

sentences.english: I’ve never been able to draw very well.
sentences.chinese: 我从来就画不好图画。

detailed_translations.english: to produce a picture of something using a pencil, pen etc

sentences.english: They meet fairly often to play chess .
sentences.chinese: 他们经常在一起下国际象棋。

detailed_translations.english: a game for two players, who move their playing pieces according to particular rules across a special board to try to trap their opponent’s king

sentences.english: I was so shocked I couldn’t speak.
sentences.chinese: 我震惊得说不出话来。

sentences.english: He spoke very softly (= quietly ) .
sentences.chinese: 他说话声音非常轻柔。

detailed_translations.english: to use your voice to produce words

sentences.english: Many sacrificed their weekend to join the hunt for the missing girl.
sentences.chinese: 许多人牺牲周末时间，加入了寻找失踪女孩的行动。

sentences.english: the benefits of joining our pension scheme
sentences.chinese: 参加我们的退休金计划的好处

sentences.english: Church leaders have joined the campaign to end foxhunting.
sentences.chinese: 教会领袖参与了禁止猎狐的运动。

sentences.english: Join the two pieces of wood with strong glue.
sentences.chinese: 用强力胶水把两块木头黏合起来。

detailed_translations.english: to begin to take part in an activity that other people are involved in

sentences.english: Manchester United Football Club
sentences.chinese: 曼联（队）足球俱乐部

sentences.english: Shall we go to a club?
sentences.chinese: 我们去夜总会怎样？

detailed_translations.chinese: 〔职业体育的〕俱乐部；俱乐部；夜总会
detailed_translations.english: a professional organization including the players, managers, and owners of a sports team

sentences.english: I’ll tell you all about it when I get back.
sentences.chinese: 我回来再告诉你这一切。

sentences.english: Sheppard was telling the truth .
sentences.chinese: 谢泼德说的是实话。

detailed_translations.english: if someone tells you something, they communicate information, a story, their feelings etc to you

detailed_translations.chinese: (Tell)人名；(英、德、瑞典)特尔；(罗、意)泰尔；(阿拉伯)塔勒

sentences.english: a book of short stories
sentences.chinese: 短篇小说集

sentences.english: We cuddled together over a bedtime story .
sentences.chinese: 我们依偎在一起看睡前故事。

sentences.english: The film was based on a true story .
sentences.chinese: 这部影片是根据真实故事改编的。

sentences.english: Don’t be frightened – it’s only a story (= it is imaginary ) .
sentences.chinese: 别害怕，这只是一个故事。

detailed_translations.chinese: 故事；小说；新闻报道；来历；假话
detailed_translations.english: a description of how something happened, that is intended to entertain people, and may be true or imaginary
to decorate (a pot, wall, etc) with scenes from history or legends

sentences.english: I wrote her several letters , but she didn’t reply.
sentences.chinese: 我给她写了几封信，可是她没有回复。

detailed_translations.english: to put words in a letter to someone

sentences.english: Think positively and show some determination.
sentences.chinese: 要往好的方面想，拿出决心来。

sentences.english: She had learned not to show her emotions .
sentences.chinese: 她早就学会了不流露出自己的感情。

sentences.english: It was the sound a man might make when in pain but trying not to show it.
sentences.chinese: 那是一个人强忍着疼痛不愿表露出来时发出的声音。

sentences.english: Mary showed great interest in the children.
sentences.chinese: 玛丽对这些小孩子表示出极大的兴趣。

detailed_translations.chinese: 显现， 显露， 露面； 演出， 放映
detailed_translations.english: to let your feelings, attitudes, or personal qualities be clearly seen

detailed_translations.chinese: 表演，节目；演出，上映；展览，展览物，展览会；显示，展示；表面，外观
detailed_translations.english: a performance for the public, especially one that includes singing, dancing, or jokes

detailed_translations.chinese: 给看，显示，出示；引领，带领；教，告知，说明；表明，证明
detailed_translations.english: to let someone see something

sentences.english: Shall we go out to the cinema or stay at home?
sentences.chinese: 我们是出去看电影还是待在家里？

sentences.english: You can have ham, cheese, or tuna.
sentences.chinese: 你可以选择火腿、干酪或者金枪鱼。

sentences.english: She wasn’t involved in drugs or anything like that.
sentences.chinese: 她没有涉毒之类的行为。

sentences.english: Grapes are usually either green or red.
sentences.chinese: 葡萄一般要么是绿色，要么是红色。

sentences.english: He’s going to do it whether we like it or not.
sentences.chinese: 不管我们喜欢与否，他都会去做这件事。

sentences.english: It’s going to snow tomorrow, or that’s what the forecast says.
sentences.chinese: 明天要下雪，确切地说，气象预报是这样说的。

detailed_translations.english: used between two words or phrases to show that either of two things is possible, or used before the last in a list of possibilities or choices

sentences.english: I could hear Sarah and Andy talking in the next room.
sentences.chinese: 我听到萨拉和安迪在隔壁讲话。

sentences.english: Sue and Bob still aren’t talking (= are refusing to talk to each other ) .
sentences.chinese: 休和鲍勃仍然互不理睬。

detailed_translations.english: to say things to someone as part of a conversation
to say things to someone as part of a conversation

sentences.english: See,I can even knock down walls with my kungfu.
sentences.chinese: 看见没，我用我的功夫把墙都撞倒了

sentences.english: What are you doing here?I am practicing kungfu.
sentences.chinese: 你在这儿干什么呢？ 我在练习功夫。

sentences.english: Whether it be in melodramas, comedies or kungfu movies, the popularity of women lead roles was unprecedented.
sentences.chinese: 无论是在剧情片、喜剧片还是功夫片中，女影星主演的角色都前所未有地受欢迎。

detailed_translations.english: an ancient Chinese fighting art in which you attack people with your hands and feet

sentences.english: a big bass drum
sentences.chinese: 一面低音大鼓

sentences.english: 1,000 people marched, beating drums and carrying flags.
sentences.chinese: 1,000人打着鼓扛着旗游行。

sentences.english: Jones played the drums in an all-girl band.
sentences.chinese: 琼斯在一个女子乐队里打鼓。

sentences.english: a brake drum
sentences.chinese: 制动鼓

sentences.english: a 5 gallon oil drum
sentences.chinese: 5加仑的油桶

detailed_translations.english: a musical instrument made of skin stretched over a circular frame, played by hitting it with your hand or a stick

sentences.english: Can you play the drums?
sentences.chinese: 你会打鼓吗？

sentences.english: You may have always had a desire to play the piano, learn the flute, or even play the drums. Why not learn now when you have the time and freedom to really put your heart into it?
sentences.chinese: 你可能一直想学钢琴，学笛子，或是学打鼓，现在你有闲有空，为什么不认认真真去学呢？

sentences.english: Jean accompanied her on the piano .
sentences.chinese: 琼为她钢琴伴奏。

detailed_translations.english: a large musical instrument that has a long row of black and white  key s  . You play the piano by sitting in front of it and pressing the keys.

sentences.english: We learned to play the piano by playing and drive a car by driving.
sentences.chinese: 我们以弹来学习弹钢琴，以驾驶来学习驾驶汽车。

sentences.english: Organizers of "Britain's Most Talented Pet" say they have found a dog that can mow the lawn and play the piano, the Daily Telegraph reported.
sentences.chinese: 据英国《每日电讯报》近日报道，"英国最有才华宠物"节目的组织者说，他们发现了一只既会除草又会弹钢琴的宠物狗。

sentences.english: So, despite not really knowing how to play the piano and not knowing how to read or write music, Cicoria got himself a piano and promptly began to play everything he heard in his head.
sentences.chinese: 于是，尽管实际上不知道该如何弹钢琴，也不知道如何读写乐谱，西科里拉还是给自己买了一台钢琴，并且立即开始弹奏脑子里听到的一切。

sentences.english: He plays the violin in an orchestra.
sentences.chinese: 他在管弦乐队中演奏小提琴。

sentences.english: She is first violin of an orchestra .
sentences.chinese: 她是管弦乐队的第一小提琴手。

sentences.english: All this from playing the violin and the cello.
sentences.chinese: 所有这些都来自于小提琴和大提琴的演奏。

detailed_translations.english: a small wooden musical instrument that you hold under your chin and play by pulling a bow(= special stick ) across the strings

sentences.english: Her friend Julie liked to play the violin.
sentences.chinese: 她的朋友朱丽喜欢拉小提琴。

sentences.english: Information is also available on women’s health care.
sentences.chinese: 还可以获得有关女性保健方面的资料。

sentences.english: She sings beautifully and also plays the flute and piano.
sentences.chinese: 她歌唱得好，而且还会吹长笛和弹钢琴。

sentences.english: The system was not only complicated but also ineffective.
sentences.chinese: 这套系统不仅复杂而且效率低。

sentences.english: My girlfriend was also called Helen.
sentences.chinese: 我的女朋友也叫海伦。

detailed_translations.english: in addition to something else that you have mentioned

sentences.english: How many people were at the meeting?
sentences.chinese: 有多少人到会？

sentences.english: At least 40 people were killed.
sentences.chinese: 至少有40人遇害。

sentences.english: He pledged that he would never lie to the American people.
sentences.chinese: 他保证绝不对美国人民撒谎。

detailed_translations.english: used as the plural of ‘person’ to refer to men, women, and children

sentences.english: They have a beautiful home in California.
sentences.chinese: 他们在加州有个美丽的家。

sentences.english: Good luck in your new home!
sentences.chinese: 祝你在新家一切顺利！

sentences.english: A family of birds made their home (= started living ) under the roof.
sentences.chinese: 一窝鸟在屋顶下安了家。

sentences.english: These children need a proper home life.
sentences.chinese: 这些孩子需要正常的家庭生活。

detailed_translations.english: the house, apartment, or place where you live
relating to or belonging to your home or family

sentences.english: I’m going to show you how to make a box for your tools.
sentences.chinese: 我来教你怎么做一个箱子存放工具。

sentences.english: A family of mice had made their nest in the roof.
sentences.chinese: 一窝老鼠在屋顶上安了家。

sentences.english: She made her own wedding dress.
sentences.chinese: 她的婚纱是自己做的。

sentences.english: The company has been making quality furniture for over 200 years.
sentences.chinese: 这家公司制作优质家具有两百多年的历史了。

sentences.english: They met while they were making a film.
sentences.chinese: 他们是在拍电影时认识的。

sentences.english: I was made to wait four hours before I was examined by a doctor.
sentences.chinese: 我被迫等了四个小时才有一个医生给我做检查。

detailed_translations.english: to produce something, for example by putting the different parts of it together

sentences.english: Now I can go anywhere and make friends and find family.
sentences.chinese: 现在我可以去任何地方，结交朋友，寻找家人。

sentences.english: Everyone needs friends, and if you fail to make friends, you should examine yourself and see if there is something wrong with your personality.
sentences.chinese: 人人都需要朋友，若你在交朋友方面总是失败，就该反省自己，看是否你的个性有什么问题。

sentences.english: I couldn’t go shopping yesterday so I’ll have to go today.
sentences.chinese: 我昨天没能去买东西，所以今天我必须去。

sentences.english: Ed has his music lesson today.
sentences.chinese: 埃德今天有音乐课。

detailed_translations.english: on the day that is happening now
the day that is happening now

sentences.english: In this example, you rotate a square on its center, but do not fill the square.
sentences.chinese: 在这个例子中，您会以中心为原点旋转一个正方形，但不填充这个正方形。

detailed_translations.chinese: 圆心， 正中； 中心

sentences.english: Are you doing anything nice this weekend?
sentences.chinese: 这个周末你有什么好的安排？

sentences.english: Tony has been unwell over the weekend (= during the weekend ).
sentences.chinese: 托尼这个周末身体不舒服。

sentences.english: We’re going to Paris for a long weekend (= Saturday and Sunday, and also Friday or Monday, or both ).
sentences.chinese: 我们要到巴黎去度一个长周末。

detailed_translations.chinese: 周末，周末休假；周末聚会
detailed_translations.english: Saturday and Sunday, especially considered as time when you do not work
to spend the weekend somewhere

sentences.english: What do people do on the weekend?
sentences.chinese: 人们通常在周末做什么？

sentences.english: Carrying a sleep debt throughout the week with the hopes of paying it off on the weekend is a bad strategy.
sentences.chinese: 工作日欠大量的睡眠债，而企图在周末一次补齐绝对是个坏主意。

sentences.english: She taught me fractions and counting.
sentences.chinese: 他教我分数和计算。

detailed_translations.english: to give lessons in a school, college, or university, or to help someone learn about something by giving them information

sentences.english: a talented young musician
sentences.chinese: 有天赋的年轻音乐家

detailed_translations.english: a person who plays a musical instrument or writes music, especially as a job

sentences.english: We walked slowly up the hill.
sentences.chinese: 我们慢慢地爬上山。

sentences.english: She picked her jacket up off the floor.
sentences.chinese: 她从地板上捡起外套。

sentences.english: paths leading up into the mountains
sentences.chinese: 通往山里的小径

sentences.english: Tim had climbed up a tree to get a better view.
sentences.chinese: 蒂姆爬到了树上，以便看得更清楚。

sentences.english: Put up your hand if you know the answer.
sentences.chinese: 如果知道答案就举手。

sentences.english: The water was getting up my nose.
sentences.chinese: 水已经没到了我的鼻子。

sentences.english: Karen lay on her back, staring up at the ceiling.
sentences.chinese: 卡伦仰卧着，盯着天花板。

sentences.english: Are you sure you should be up?
sentences.chinese: 你肯定你该起床了吗?

sentences.english: These days they were up at the crack of dawn.
sentences.chinese: 这些天他们在破晓时就起床。

detailed_translations.english: towards a higher place or position
If you are up, you are not in bed

sentences.english: I got up and walked over to where he was.
sentences.chinese: 我站起来，走到他那里。

sentences.english: They have to get up early in the morning.
sentences.chinese: 他们一大早就得起床。

detailed_translations.english: When someone who is sitting or lying down gets up, they rise to a standing position

sentences.english: a gentleman in evening dress
sentences.chinese: 穿晚礼服的绅士

sentences.english: The play was performed in modern dress (= clothes from the present time ) .
sentences.chinese: 这出戏里演员是现代装束。

detailed_translations.english: clothes for men or women of a particular type or for a particular occasion

sentences.english: Why don't you get dressed now?
sentences.chinese: 你为什么现在还不穿好衣服？

sentences.english: For me, the hardest part of a day is getting ready in the morning; I’d much rather sit down with a cup of joe and check my email than take a shower, get dressed, and take my son to daycare.
sentences.chinese: 对我来说，一天中最难的部分就是早晨上班前的准备；我更愿意坐下来喝上一杯咖啡，查看电邮，之后再洗个澡，穿好衣服，再送儿子去日托所。

sentences.english: Grabbed me by my arm, had me get dressed, and drove me in to school.
sentences.chinese: 她抓着我的手臂，让我穿好衣服，然后开车送我去学校。

sentences.english: a scrubbing brush
sentences.chinese: 硬毛刷，板刷

detailed_translations.english: an object that you use for cleaning, painting, making your hair tidy etc, made with a lot of hairs,  bristle s  , or thin pieces of plastic, fastened to a handle

sentences.english: Sugar is bad for your teeth.
sentences.chinese: 糖对牙齿不好。

detailed_translations.english: one of the hard white objects in your mouth that you use to bite and eat food

sentences.english: Why does the phone always ring when I’m in the shower?
sentences.chinese: 为什么电话铃总是在我洗澡的时候响？

sentences.english: I’d like to use the shower if that’s all right.
sentences.chinese: 如果可以的话，我想用一下这里的淋浴。

sentences.english: The bathroom has a separate shower cubicle (= a shower in a separate part of the room ) .
sentences.chinese: 卫生间里有一个独立的淋浴间。

sentences.english: I need a shower.
sentences.chinese: 我需要洗个淋浴。

sentences.english: Mike shaved and showered.
sentences.chinese: 迈克刮了脸，冲了个淋浴。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of equipment that you stand under to wash your whole body
to wash your whole body while standing under a shower

sentences.english: Our suggestion: Insist that everyone take a shower before hitting the pool. And make it a warm one.
sentences.chinese: 我们的建议是：坚持保证每个人入水前都先去冲个淋浴，而且要是热水的。

sentences.english: Women usually live longer than men.
sentences.chinese: 女人通常比男人长寿。

sentences.english: Usually I wear black, grey, or brown.
sentences.chinese: 通常我都穿黑色、灰色或者棕色的衣服。

sentences.english: The drive usually takes 15 or 20 minutes.
sentences.chinese: 这段车程通常需要 15 或 20 分钟。

detailed_translations.english: used to talk about what happens on most occasions or in most situations

sentences.english: The place was built as a casino in the forties.
sentences.chinese: 这个地方建于20世纪40年代，起初是一座赌场。

detailed_translations.english: the number 40

sentences.english: Wow!What do you major in?
sentences.chinese: 哇哦！你的专业是什么?

sentences.english: Wow! Can we try it?
sentences.chinese: 哇！ 我们能试试它么？

sentences.english: It was hard to watch friends, or to watch people who I admired, up there performing and think to myself, 'Wow, I only know that now from here — from standing in the audience.
sentences.chinese: 斯泰普说，“看到朋友或是我崇拜的人在台上演出，想到‘哇，我对他们现在的了解的只是从现在，从站在听众里的这一刻开始。’ 这是自己很难接受的。”

detailed_translations.english: used when you think something is very impressive or surprising

sentences.english: He’s never been to Australia.
sentences.chinese: 他从未去过澳大利亚。

sentences.english: I’m never going back there again, not as long as I live.
sentences.chinese: 只要我活着，我再也不会回到那儿去。

sentences.english: It is never too late to give up smoking.
sentences.chinese: 戒烟不言晚。

sentences.english: (= never after a particular time ) would he return to Naples.
sentences.chinese: 他再也不会回到那不勒斯。

detailed_translations.english: not at any time, or not once

sentences.english: We arrived early.
sentences.chinese: 我们提早到了。

sentences.english: They must have come home early.
sentences.chinese: 他们肯定提早回到家了。

sentences.english: the early morning sunshine
sentences.chinese: 清晨的阳光

detailed_translations.english: before the usual, arranged, or expected time
in the first part of a period of time, event, or process

sentences.english: Standards of living rose in the fifties.
sentences.chinese: 50年代生活水平提高了。

detailed_translations.english: the number 50

sentences.english: Do you enjoy your job?
sentences.chinese: 你喜欢自己的工作吗？

sentences.english: It was the first paid job I ever had.
sentences.chinese: 这是我第一份拿工资的工作。

sentences.english: He’s been in the job for six years.
sentences.chinese: 他干这份工作有六年了。

sentences.chinese: 我在找一份新工作。

sentences.chinese: 换工作的话，会影响到你的退休金。

sentences.chinese: 萨姆为朋友和邻居打打零工。

detailed_translations.english: the regular paid work that you do for an employer

sentences.chinese: 每年这个时候工作机会都不多。

sentences.english: He’s been out of work (= without a job ) for two years.

sentences.chinese: 现在有工作的人比十年前多。

detailed_translations.chinese: 工作；[物] 功；产品；操作；职业；行为；事业；工厂；著作；文学、音乐或艺术作品
detailed_translations.english: a job or activity that you do regularly, especially in order to earn money

detailed_translations.chinese: 使工作；操作；经营；使缓慢前进
detailed_translations.english: to do the activities and duties that are part of your job

sentences.english: I want to get off at the next station.
sentences.chinese: 我要在下一站下车。

sentences.english: Is there a waiting room in the station?

sentences.english: the city bus station
sentences.chinese: 市内公共汽车站

detailed_translations.english: a place where trains or buses regularly stop so that passengers can get on and off, goods can be loaded etc, or the buildings at such a place
to send someone in the military to a particular place for a period of time as part of their military duty

sentences.chinese: “佛斯特”女士在长岛赫鲁布克上高中的时候就开始梦想有这样一所乡村别墅,那时,他的父亲是一名电台播音员,并且开始尝试自己做广播站。

detailed_translations.english: an installation consisting of one or more transmitters or receivers, etc, used for radiocommunications

sentences.english: It's already 9 o'clock.
sentences.chinese: 已经9点钟了。

sentences.english: The meeting is at 10 o'clock.
sentences.chinese: 开会时间是10点钟。

detailed_translations.english: one of the times when the clock shows the exact hour as a number from 1 to 12

sentences.english: It was a cold moonlit night.
sentences.chinese: 那是个寒冷的月夜。

sentences.english: I didn’t sleep too well last night.
sentences.chinese: 我昨晚睡得不太好。

detailed_translations.english: the dark part of each 24-hour period when the sun cannot be seen and when most people sleep

sentences.english: the funniest man in Britain
sentences.chinese: 英国最滑稽的男人

sentences.english: If this is your idea of a joke, I don’t find it at all funny .
sentences.chinese: 如果你觉得这是个玩笑，那我认为它一点也不好笑。

sentences.english: Luckily, when I explained the situation, he saw the funny side (= recognized that it was partly funny ) .
sentences.chinese: 好在我把情况解释了以后，他看到了好笑的一面。

sentences.chinese: 他的笑声打断了她的话。“有什么好笑的？”她厉声问道。

sentences.english: What’s that funny smell?

detailed_translations.english: making you laugh

sentences.chinese: 尽量在日常生活中安排一些经常性的锻炼。

sentences.english: Working in an office, I don’t get much exercise.
sentences.chinese: 由于在办公室工作，我很少运动。

sentences.english: role-play exercises

sentences.chinese: 马需要有规律的训练。

to do sports or other physical activities in order to stay healthy or become stronger; to make an animal do this

sentences.chinese: 我们应当在周末投票，或让选举日成为一个国家假日。

sentences.chinese: 它甚至将在周末提供大学预备课程和领导能力课程。

sentences.english: He won the best actor award.
sentences.chinese: 他获得最佳男演员奖。

sentences.english: The best thing to do is to stop worrying.
sentences.chinese: 最好的办法就是不要再担心。

sentences.english: Our pilots are given the best possible training.
sentences.chinese: 我们的飞行员接受最好的训练。

sentences.english: We use only the very best ingredients.
sentences.chinese: 我们只用最好的原料。

detailed_translations.english: better than anything else or anyone else in quality, skill, how effective it is etc

sentences.chinese: 两个一半构成一个整体。

sentences.english: Only half the guests had arrived by seven o’clock.
sentences.chinese: 7点钟前只来了一半客人。

sentences.english: If you look at our members, at least half are women.
sentences.chinese: 看看我们的会员，至少有一半是女性。

sentences.chinese: …半量杯的新鲜柠檬汁。

detailed_translations.english: one of two equal parts of something
exactly or about 50% (1/2) of an amount, time, distance, number etc

sentences.chinese: 从以往的表现来看，简应该会干得很好。

sentences.english: From past experience she knew that it was no use arguing with him.
sentences.chinese: 根据过去的经验，她知道和他争论是没有用的。

sentences.english: Study some past exam papers to get an idea of the questions.
sentences.chinese: 仔细看看以前的一些考卷，了解一下考题。

sentences.english: It’s time she stopped living in the past (= thinking only about the past ) and began to think about her future.
sentences.chinese: 她不该再沉湎过去，应开始想想将来。

detailed_translations.english: done, used, or experienced before now
the time that existed before the present

sentences.english: It’s about a page and a quarter.
sentences.chinese: 大概是一又四分之一页。

sentences.english: Cut the cake into quarters.
sentences.chinese: 把蛋糕切成四等份。

sentences.english: I’ll meet you in a quarter of an hour.
sentences.chinese: 我们一刻钟之后见。

detailed_translations.english: one of four equal parts into which something can be divided

sentences.english: For homework, finish the exercise on page 14.
sentences.chinese: 家庭作业是完成第14页的练习。

detailed_translations.english: work that a student at school is asked to do at home

sentences.english: For a while, she ran a restaurant in Boston.
sentences.chinese: 有一段时间她在波士顿开餐馆。

sentences.english: Many people don’t care who runs the country.
sentences.chinese: 很多人不在乎由谁统治国家。

sentences.english: Courses are currently being run in London and Edinburgh.
sentences.chinese: 目前伦敦和爱丁堡两地都开设了这些课程。

sentences.english: Many people belong to a pension scheme run by their employers.
sentences.chinese: 许多人参加了由雇主管理的养老金计划。

detailed_translations.english: to be very busy and continuously rushing about

sentences.english: Are your hands clean?
sentences.chinese: 你的手干净吗？

sentences.english: clean towels
sentences.chinese: 干净的毛巾

sentences.english: Make sure you keep the wound clean .
sentences.chinese: 一定要保持伤口清洁。

sentences.english: Wipe that sink clean when you’re done.
sentences.chinese: 洗完后将水槽擦干净。

sentences.english: As usual, she left her room clean and tidy before going to school.
sentences.chinese: 和往常一样，她去上学之前把房间收拾得干干净净。

sentences.english: a spotlessly clean kitchen
sentences.chinese: 一尘不染的厨房

sentences.english: Oh, don’t get mad - it’s just good clean fun !
sentences.chinese: 噢，不要生气——这不过是个正经的玩笑嘛！

detailed_translations.english: without any dirt, marks etc

sentences.english: It’s a long walk. Maybe we should get the bus.
sentences.chinese: 走着去很远，或许我们应该乘公共汽车。

sentences.chinese: 罗莎娜与福布斯默默地走着。

sentences.english: We walked into the foyer.
sentences.chinese: 我们走进前厅。

sentences.chinese: 我向栅栏走了几步。

When you walk, you move forward by putting one foot in front of the other in a regular way

sentences.english: When I ask why, their face clouds with frustration. That there just isn't time to sit back and watch the sun set or take a walk in the park is a common response.
sentences.chinese: 当我问他们为什么会这样的时候，他们脸上露出了沮丧的表情，普遍的回答是没有时间去舒适地休息一下，甚至没有时间观看日升日落亦或是在公园里散散步。

sentences.english: We need to get this finished as quickly as possible.
sentences.chinese: 我们必须尽快完成此事。

sentences.english: Kids grow up so quickly these days.
sentences.chinese: 现在的孩子长得真快啊。

detailed_translations.english: fast

sentences.english: You can park on either side of the street.
sentences.chinese: 这条街两边都可停车。

detailed_translations.english: one or the other of two; it does not matter which

sentences.english: We’ve spent a lot on the children’s education.
sentences.chinese: 我们在孩子的教育上花费甚多。

sentences.english: ‘How many CDs have you got?’ ‘Lots.’
sentences.chinese: “你有多少张CD？”“多着呢。”

sentences.english: They drew lots for the right to go first.
sentences.chinese: 他们拈阄儿决定谁先走。

detailed_translations.english: a large amount or number

sentences.chinese: 屋子近旁种着许多梨树。

sentences.chinese: 许多游客在大街上伸长了脖子东张西望。

sentences.english: We have lots of engineers, and lots of scientists.
sentences.chinese: 我们有许多的工程师和科学家。

sentences.english: I sometimes have to work late.
sentences.chinese: 我有时得工作到很晚。

sentences.english: Sometimes, Grandma would tell us stories about her childhood in Italy.
sentences.chinese: 有时候，祖母会跟我们讲讲她儿时在意大利的经历。

sentences.english: ‘Do you ever wish you were back in Japan?’ ‘Sometimes. Not very often.’
sentences.chinese: “你有没有想过希望回到日本？”“有时候吧，但不经常这么想。”

sentences.english: The journey takes an hour, sometimes even longer.
sentences.chinese: 路上需要一小时，有时甚至更长。

detailed_translations.english: on some occasions but not always

sentences.english: Some birds have a highly developed sense of taste.
sentences.chinese: 有些鸟的味觉很发达。

sentences.english: She has such good taste.
sentences.chinese: 她的品位很高雅。

detailed_translations.english: the sense by which you know one food from another

sentences.english: ...a baby's first minutes of life.
sentences.chinese: …婴儿生命的头几分钟。

sentences.chinese: 我的个人生活不得不放在我的事业之后。

sentences.chinese: 大赦国际组织反对死刑，因其侵犯生存权。

sentences.english: We went all the way to Inverness by train.
sentences.chinese: 我们一路坐火车到因弗内斯。

detailed_translations.english: a set of several carriages that are connected to each other and pulled along a railway line by an engine

sentences.english: I took a bus to San Francisco.
sentences.chinese: 我乘公共汽车去旧金山。

sentences.english: Buses run at 15 and 30 minutes past the hour.
sentences.chinese: 公共汽车在每小时的15分和30分时发车。

detailed_translations.english: a large vehicle that people pay to travel on

sentences.english: the New York City subway
sentences.chinese: 纽约市的地铁

sentences.english: a crowded subway station
sentences.chinese: 拥挤的地铁站

sentences.english: Boston has the oldest subway system in the US.
sentences.chinese: 波士顿拥有美国最老的地铁运输系统。

sentences.chinese: 你可以乘地铁去。

sentences.english: You can take the subway near your hotel.
sentences.chinese: 你可以在宾馆附近乘地铁。

sentences.chinese: 她七岁时学会了骑马。

sentences.chinese: 他骑着一匹灰色的大母马。

sentences.chinese: 他宁愿乘坐地铁出行而不愿乘坐豪华加长轿车。

sentences.english: She took some friends for a ride in the family car.
sentences.chinese: 她用私家车载了朋友们一程。

a trip on a horse or bicycle, or in a vehicle.

sentences.english: Let’s go for a bike ride.
sentences.chinese: 我们去骑会儿自行车吧。

sentences.english: She bikes to work every day.
sentences.chinese: 她每天骑自行车上班。

detailed_translations.english: a bicycle
to ride a bicycle

sentences.chinese: CNN给了我这些，还有其他一些津贴，用于奖励步行或者骑自行车上班的雇员。

sentences.english: The court heard that Glen could walk, run and ride a bike, and was excited by police cars and fire engines, but he did not talk.
sentences.chinese: 法院了解到，格林能走能跑、会骑自行车，看见警车和消防车就雀跃，但却无法和人交谈。

sentences.english: As you build strength and stamina, walk faster or farther, lift weights, ride a bike, or try a class at a local gym or yoga studio.
sentences.chinese: 当你身体变得强壮和更具持久力时，可以走得时间长些距离远些，练习下举重，骑骑自行车，或者尝试在当地体育馆或瑜伽社报个班。

sentences.english: sixty years ago
sentences.chinese: 六十年前

detailed_translations.english: the number

sentences.english: We lost touch during the seventies.
sentences.chinese: 我们在70年代失去了联系。

detailed_translations.chinese: 七十；七十个；七十岁；七十年代
detailed_translations.english: the number 70

detailed_translations.chinese: 七十的；七十个的；七十岁的

detailed_translations.english: the number 70

sentences.english: The band was incredibly successful in the eighties.
sentences.chinese: 这支乐队在80年代红透半边天。

detailed_translations.english: the number 80

detailed_translations.chinese: 八十的，八十个的；八十岁的

detailed_translations.english: the number 80

sentences.english: America was far richer in the nineties.
sentences.chinese: 90年代的美国要富裕得多。

detailed_translations.english: the number 90
the number 90

sentences.english: The tree was probably a hundred years old.
sentences.chinese: 这棵树很可能已经有100年了。

sentences.english: They’ve had this argument a hundred times before.
sentences.chinese: 这个问题他们以前已经争论过无数次了。

detailed_translations.english: the number 100
a very large number of things or people

sentences.english: It takes me ten minutes to walk to work.
sentences.chinese: 我步行上班要用十分钟。

sentences.english: The train arrived at four minutes past eight.
sentences.chinese: 火车于八点零四分到达。

sentences.english: He returned a few minutes later.
sentences.chinese: 几分钟后他回来了。

sentences.english: I’ll meet you at the car in five minutes.
sentences.chinese: 五分钟后我在车那儿和你见面。

sentences.chinese: 萨姆想了一下，然后冲着他的兄弟笑了。

detailed_translations.english: a unit for measuring time. There are 60 minutes in one hour

name: far
trans: 远；用于表示进展情况或影响程度

sentences.english: We can walk to my house from here. It isn’t far.
sentences.chinese: 我们可以从这里步行去我家，不远。

sentences.english: You could see the mountains in the far distance.
sentences.chinese: 你可以看到远处的群山。

sentences.english: Since I changed jobs, I have to travel further to get to work.
sentences.chinese: 我换了工作，上班更远了。

detailed_translations.english: a long distance away
a long distance

sentences.chinese: 在350公里的行程中，她要克服暴风雪、滑坡、蛇和孤独寂寞。

sentences.chinese: 但是，该组织说，事故发生后，在30公里禁区内种植和收获的食物可能受到污染，应该避免食用。

sentences.english: For example, the researchers last week said they had managed to gather enough energy from a TV station a half-kilometer away to power a small temperature sensor.
sentences.chinese: 例如，研究人员上周说，他们已经设法从半公里远的一座电视发射台收集了足够了能量给一个小型温度传感器供电。

detailed_translations.chinese: [计量] 公里；[计量] 千米（等于kilometre）

sentences.english: the city’s new hospital
sentences.chinese: 市里新建的医院

sentences.english: the new issue of ‘Time’ magazine
sentences.chinese: 新一期《时代周刊》

sentences.english: new products on the market
sentences.chinese: 市场上的新产品

sentences.english: The hardest part of this job is understanding the new technology.
sentences.chinese: 这项工作最难的地方是理解新技术。

sentences.english: a young man with new ideas
sentences.chinese: 一个有新观念的年轻人

detailed_translations.english: recently made, built, invented, written, designed etc

sentences.english: His every utterance will be scrutinized.
sentences.chinese: 他说的每句话都会被细查。

sentences.english: She knows every student in the school.
sentences.chinese: 她认识学校里的每一个学生。

sentences.english: The buses go every 10 minutes.
sentences.chinese: 公共汽车每隔10分钟发一班车。

detailed_translations.english: used with singular nouns to refer to all the members of a group of things or people

sentences.english: He catlicks his face every day.
sentences.chinese: 他每天马马虎虎地洗脸。

sentences.english: They mucked up the floor every day.
sentences.chinese: 他们每天都把地板弄脏。

sentences.english: They commute between Beijing and Tianjin every day.
sentences.chinese: 他们每天往返于北京与天津之间。

sentences.english: She stood by the window.
sentences.chinese: 她站在窗边。

sentences.english: I was attacked by a dog.
sentences.chinese: 我被一条狗袭击。

sentences.english: a church designed by the famous architect, Sir Christopher Wren
sentences.chinese: 著名建筑师克里斯托弗·雷恩爵士设计的一座教堂

sentences.english: We are all alarmed by the rise in violent crime.
sentences.chinese: 我们都对暴力罪案的增加感到忧虑。

sentences.english: interference by the state in the affairs of the Church
sentences.chinese: 国家对教会事务的干预

sentences.english: his appointment by the BBC as a producer
sentences.chinese: 英国广播公司委任他为制片人

detailed_translations.english: beside or near something

sentences.english: Do you go to school by bus or by bike?
sentences.chinese: 你去学校是乘巴士还是骑单车呢？

sentences.english: She usually goes to work by bike except on rainy days.
sentences.chinese: 除了雨天之外， 她总是骑自行车上班。

sentences.english: So the week after Easter we set off by bike on a four-day trip to Wimpfen, Amorbach, and Miltenberg.
sentences.chinese: 因此复活节后那个星期我们骑自行车出发去温普芬，阿莫巴赫和米尔藤贝格进行为期四天的旅行。

sentences.english: Can you drive?
sentences.chinese: 你会开车吗？

sentences.english: We watched Dad drive the posts into the ground.
sentences.chinese: 我们看着爸爸把木桩打入地里。

sentences.english: With a few loud whistles, they drove the donkeys out of the enclosure.
sentences.chinese: 随着几声响亮的哨声，他们把驴子赶出了围栏。

detailed_translations.english: to make a car, truck, bus etc move along

sentences.english: Dan got out of the car and locked the door.
sentences.chinese: 丹下了车，锁上车门。

sentences.english: Another approach to the problem is described in Chapter 3.
sentences.chinese: 这个问题的另一种解决方法在第三章有所阐述。

detailed_translations.chinese: 形容， 描写； 画出
detailed_translations.english: to say what something or someone is like by giving details about them

sentences.english: Words written alike are often pronounced differently.
sentences.chinese: 拼法相同的词往往读音不同。

sentences.english: Different lawyers may construe the same law differently.
sentences.chinese: 对同一法律，不同的律师可以做出不同的解释。

sentences.english: For me, this uncertainty lies at the heart of what we need to know if we are to understand ourselves and behave differently.
sentences.chinese: 对我而言，这样的不确定性就存在于我们需要去了解的内心，即我们懂得我们自己和行为本身是不同的。

sentences.english: They must have returned by another route.
sentences.chinese: 他们肯定是从另一条路线回来的。

detailed_translations.english: not the same thing, person etc, but a different one

sentences.english: He wore spectacles perched on the very end of his nose.
sentences.chinese: 他的眼镜架在鼻尖上。

sentences.english: The end of the pencil snapped.
sentences.chinese: 铅笔的笔尖啪的一声断了。

sentences.english: Jo joined the end of the line.
sentences.chinese: 乔排到了队尾。

sentences.english: She’ll do anything to achieve her own ends.
sentences.chinese: 她为了实现自己的目标，什么都会去做。

sentences.english: The road ends here.
sentences.chinese: 这条路到此为止。

detailed_translations.english: the part of a place or object that is furthest from its beginning or centre
to finish; to make sth finish

sentences.english: He calmed down in the end.
sentences.chinese: 他的情绪终于平定下来。

sentences.english: There really is no time like the present, and if you miss it…well…we all go away in the end.
sentences.chinese: 事实上，没有其他时间像是现在一样，如果你错过了现在……那么……我们最后都会死去。

sentences.english: She had never seen a real live elephant before.
sentences.chinese: 她以前从未见过活生生的大象。

sentences.english: a coat made of real fur
sentences.chinese: 真皮大衣

sentences.english: Things don’t happen quite that easily in real life.
sentences.chinese: 现实生活中不会动不动就有这样的事情发生。

detailed_translations.english: something that is real is actually what it seems to be and not false or artificial

sentences.english: ...a young man in jeans and a worn T-shirt.
sentences.chinese: …一个穿着牛仔裤和破旧T恤衫的年轻人。

detailed_translations.english: trousers made of denim(= a strong, usually blue, cotton cloth )

sentences.english: Serve the meat with rice or noodles.
sentences.chinese: 肉配米饭或面条一起上。

detailed_translations.english: a long thin piece of food made from a mixture of flour, water, and eggs, usually cooked in soup or boiling water

sentences.english: ...a leg of mutton.
sentences.chinese: …一条羊腿。

detailed_translations.english: the meat from a sheep

sentences.english: roast beef
sentences.chinese: 烤牛肉

sentences.english: We have both dairy and beef cattle on the farm.
sentences.chinese: 我们农场里奶牛和菜牛都有。

detailed_translations.english: the meat from a cow
to complain a lot

sentences.english: I like peas more than cabbage .
sentences.chinese: 比起卷心菜我更喜欢豌豆。

sentences.english: We have cabbage and mutton.
sentences.chinese: 我们有卷心菜和羊肉。

sentences.english: We have fresh cabbage, celery, lettuce and spinach.
sentences.chinese: 有新鲜的卷心菜、芹菜、生菜和菠菜。

detailed_translations.english: a large round vegetable with thick green or purple leaves

sentences.english: Marie stood at the sink, peeling potatoes (= cutting off the skin ) .
sentences.chinese: 玛丽站在洗涤槽边削土豆皮。

detailed_translations.chinese: [作物] 土豆，[作物] 马铃薯
detailed_translations.english: a round white vegetable with a brown, red, or pale yellow skin, that grows under the ground

sentences.english: a special place in the classroom for reading
sentences.chinese: 教室里的阅读专区

sentences.english: No one receives special treatment.
sentences.chinese: 没有人享有特殊待遇。

sentences.english: Maria’s special recipe for apple pie
sentences.chinese: 玛丽亚的苹果馅饼秘方

sentences.english: The good china was used only on special occasions .
sentences.chinese: 这些精美瓷器只在特殊场合使用。

sentences.english: Each village has its own special charm.
sentences.chinese: 每一座村子都有其独特的魅力。

detailed_translations.english: not ordinary or usual, but different in some way and often better or more important

sentences.english: Would you shut the window, please?
sentences.chinese: 请把窗户关上，好吗？

sentences.english: Would you mind waiting outside?
sentences.chinese: 您在外面等好吗？

sentences.english: Would someone please tell me what is going on?
sentences.chinese: 请问谁能告诉我发生什么事了？

detailed_translations.english: used to ask someone politely to do something

sentences.english: I would like to live to , and not to live.
sentences.chinese: 我愿意为了而活着，不愿意为了活着而。

sentences.english: And then you would like me as well as your father?
sentences.chinese: 那你就会喜欢我像喜欢你父亲一样了吗？

name: yet
trans: （常用于否定句或疑问句）还；仍然

sentences.english: ‘When’s your holiday?’ ‘Oh, not for ages yet.’
sentences.chinese: “你什么时候去休假？”“噢，不知何年何月呢。”

sentences.english: It could be months yet before they know their fate.
sentences.chinese: 可能要好几个月他们才能知道自己的命运。

detailed_translations.english: used to emphasize how much time will pass before something happens, or how long a situation will continue
used to introduce a fact, situation, or quality that is surprising after what you have just said

sentences.english: Los Angeles is the second largest city in the US.
sentences.chinese: 洛杉矶是美国的第二大城市。

sentences.english: The T-shirt comes in Small, Medium and Large.
sentences.chinese: 这种T恤有小号、中号和大号。

sentences.english: a large ovenproof pan
sentences.chinese: 一只耐热的大烤盘

sentences.english: large sums ofmoney
sentences.chinese: 大笔的钱

sentences.english: those who drink large amounts of coffee
sentences.chinese: 咖啡喝得很多的人

sentences.english: A large number of students have signed up for the course.
sentences.chinese: 很多学生报名读这门课程。

detailed_translations.english: big in size, amount, or number

sentences.english: There seemed to be no logical order to the sections.
sentences.chinese: 这几部分似乎没有逻辑顺序。

sentences.english: Let’s have some order in here.
sentences.chinese: 我们把这里整理一下吧。

sentences.english: The court ordered his release from prison.
sentences.chinese: 法院下令放他出狱。

detailed_translations.english: the way that things or events are arranged in relation to each other, so that one thing is first, another thing is second etc
to tell someone that they must do something, especially using your official power or authority

sentences.english: He’s a small boy, about John’s size.
sentences.chinese: 他是个小男孩，个子和约翰差不多。

sentences.english: Jensens’ house is about the same size as ours.
sentences.chinese: 詹森的房子和我们的差不多大。

sentences.english: He’s quite a big dog, but he’s still not full size yet.
sentences.chinese: 这条狗体型很大，但还没有长足。

detailed_translations.english: how big or small something is
to sort according to size

sentences.english: Mix all the ingredients thoroughly in a large bowl.
sentences.chinese: 将所有配料放在大碗里搅拌均匀。

sentences.english: Fill the bowl with water.
sentences.chinese: 在碗里装满水。

detailed_translations.english: a wide round container that is open at the top, used to hold liquids, food, flowers etc

detailed_translations.chinese: 玩保龄球；滑动；平稳快速移动
detailed_translations.english: to travel along very quickly and smoothly

sentences.english: But I also use it on baked potatoes, salads, tofu, and dozens of other foods.
sentences.chinese: 但是，我也用它来混合烤土豆，沙拉，豆腐，和几十个其他食物。

sentences.english: Soy products like tofu, tempeh and fortified soymilk do double duty in this regard since they provide both calcium and protein.
sentences.chinese: 大豆食品像豆腐、豆豉和强化豆奶在这方面有双重功能，因为它们可同时提供钙和蛋白。

detailed_translations.english: a soft white food made from  soya beans , used in cooking instead of meat

sentences.english: I gave up eating meat a few months ago.
sentences.chinese: 我几个月以前开始不吃肉了。

sentences.english: raw meat
sentences.chinese: 生肉

sentences.english: a meat pie
sentences.chinese: 肉馅饼

sentences.english: a selection of cold meats
sentences.chinese: 各种冷盘肉

detailed_translations.english: the flesh of animals and birds eaten as food

sentences.english: chicken and dumplings
sentences.chinese: 鸡肉和汤团

detailed_translations.english: a round lump of flour and fat mixed with water, cooked in boiling liquid and served with meat

sentences.english: I'll pass on the fried potato crisp, but take the porridge.
sentences.chinese: 炸土豆片我不吃了，粥还是要喝的。

detailed_translations.english: oats  that are cooked with milk or water and served hot for breakfast

sentences.english: Chop the onions finely.
sentences.chinese: 把洋葱切碎。

sentences.english: red onions
sentences.chinese: 红皮洋葱

sentences.english: home-made onion soup
sentences.chinese: 自制的洋葱汤

detailed_translations.english: a round white vegetable with a brown, red, or white skin and many layers. Onions have a strong taste and smell.

sentences.english: Over 1,500 different species of fish inhabit the waters around the reef.
sentences.chinese: 那片礁石周围的水域生活着1,500多种不同的鱼类。

sentences.english: The stonefish is the most deadly of all fishes.
sentences.chinese: 石鱼是所有鱼类中毒性最强的。

sentences.english: You usually drinks white wine with fish.
sentences.chinese: 白葡萄酒一般配鱼喝

sentences.english: Dad really loves to fish.
sentences.chinese: 爸爸很喜欢钓鱼。

detailed_translations.english: an animal that lives in water, and uses its fins and tail to swim
to try to catch fish

sentences.english: The classic example is tossing a pancake so it flips over in mid-air.
sentences.chinese: 最经典的例子是摊薄饼的时候，颠勺时薄饼就会飞到半空中。

sentences.english: The package says baking and pancake mix, but the pancakes were not tasty without some major tweaking to the recipe.
sentences.chinese: 包装盒上说烤焙与薄饼面料混合，但没有添加一些主要调料，薄饼是不好吃的。

sentences.english: They are so-called “ pancake people ”, they no longer concentrate their energies on one area of interest, but instead choose to spread themselves thinly over a large area.
sentences.chinese: 他们就是所谓的“煎饼人”，他们不再将精力专注于某一个感兴趣的领域，而是让自己的关注点浅浅地散布在一个很大的范围。

detailed_translations.english: a thin flat round cake made from flour, milk, and eggs, that has been cooked in a flat pan and is eaten hot

sentences.english: Tuberculosis is still common in some parts of the world .
sentences.chinese: 结核病在世界上某些地区仍很常见。

sentences.english: At that time China was the most powerful country in the world .
sentences.chinese: 当时中国是世界上最强大的国家。

sentences.english: The Taj Mahal attracts visitors from around the world .
sentences.chinese: 泰姬陵吸引了来自世界各地的游客。

sentences.english: Students from all over the world come to study at Oxford.
sentences.chinese: 世界各地的学生到牛津大学来求学。

sentences.english: Children are the same the world over .
sentences.chinese: 全世界的孩子都一样。

sentences.english: The book has been published throughout the world .
sentences.chinese: 这本书已在世界各地出版。

sentences.english: There is nothing quite like it anywhere in the world .
sentences.chinese: 世界上任何地方都找不出和它类似的东西。

sentences.english: Europe’s relationship with the rest of the world
sentences.chinese: 欧洲和世界上其他地区的关系

sentences.english: I decided to take a year off to travel the world .
sentences.chinese: 我决定休息一年去周游世界。

sentences.english: a crime that shocked the world
sentences.chinese: 震惊全世界的罪行

detailed_translations.chinese: 世界；领域；世俗；全人类；物质生活
detailed_translations.english: the  planet  we live on, and all the people, cities, and countries on it

sentences.english: We have people coming from all around the world.
sentences.chinese: 我们那里有来自世界各地的人。

sentences.english: (Applause.) Together, they represent the great potential and expectations of young people around the world.
sentences.chinese: （掌声）他们共同代表着世界各地年轻人的极大潜力和期望。

sentences.english: Thanks to all the fans who make this tournament the best in the world and thanks to my family who travel with me around the world and make it all possible.
sentences.chinese: 非常谢谢所有球迷，是你们让这次的比赛变得如此的精彩，感谢我的家人，他们陪伴我在世界各地旅行，使他们让这一切成真。

sentences.english: Does this answer your requirements?
sentences.chinese: 这个符合你的要求吗？

detailed_translations.english: to be suitable for sth; to match sth

sentences.english: The place looks completely different now.
sentences.chinese: 这地方现在完全变了。

sentences.english: They decided to try a radically different approach.
sentences.chinese: 他们决定尝试一种全然不同的办法。

sentences.english: We found women had significantly different political views from men.
sentences.chinese: 我们发现女性的政治观点与男性大不相同。

sentences.english: a slightly different way of doing things
sentences.chinese: 稍有区别的做事方法

sentences.english: What actually happened was subtly different from the PR people’s version.
sentences.chinese: 实际情况与公关部那些人的说法有细微的差别。

sentences.english: The show is refreshingly different from most exhibitions of modern art.
sentences.chinese: 这次展览与大多数现代艺术展不一样，令人耳目一新。

sentences.english: The publishing business is no different from any other business in this respect.
sentences.chinese: 从这一点来讲，出版业和其他任何行业没有什么差别。

sentences.english: It’s a different world here in London.
sentences.chinese: 伦敦这儿的情况完全不同。

detailed_translations.english: not like something or someone else, or not like before

sentences.english: We had cake and ice cream.
sentences.chinese: 我们吃了蛋糕和冰激凌。

sentences.english: a chocolate cake
sentences.chinese: 巧克力蛋糕

detailed_translations.english: a soft sweet food made by baking a mixture of flour, butter, sugar, and eggs

sentences.english: The candle flickered in the wind.
sentences.chinese: 烛光在风中闪烁不定。

sentences.english: The candle flickered and then went out.
sentences.chinese: 一开始蜡烛摇曳不定， 然后就灭了。

sentences.english: When the candle was only half an inch high it flickered out and the room became dark.
sentences.chinese: 蜡烛只有半英寸长时，烛光忽闪忽闪地熄灭了，于是房间一片漆黑。

detailed_translations.english: a stick of  wax  with a string through the middle, which you burn to give light

sentences.english: Francis is the same age as me.
sentences.chinese: 弗朗西斯和我同年岁。

sentences.english: Experts disagree over the age of the drawings.
sentences.chinese: 专家对这些画作的年代意见不统一。

sentences.english: Dad retired at the age of 56.
sentences.chinese: 爸爸是在56岁时退休的。

sentences.english: We are living in the age of technology.
sentences.chinese: 我们生活在科技时代。

sentences.english: He was worried to see how much she’d aged.
sentences.chinese: 看到她苍老了许多，他很担心。

detailed_translations.english: the number of years someone has lived or something has existed
to start looking older or to make someone or something look older

sentences.english: If you see a falling star, don't wonder why, just make a wish.
sentences.chinese: 如果您看到一颗流星，不要怀疑，只要许一个愿。

sentences.english: "Please make a wish when you fill in a single circular eye," Fukuda explained to Bush, according to the Japanese official.
sentences.chinese: 据这位日本官员介绍，福田首相向布什总统解释说，“画上一只眼睛后，请许下生日愿望。”

sentences.english: It is now my birthday. In the US, we have a tradition that when you blow out the candles on your birthday cake, you should make a wish.
sentences.chinese: 今天是我的生日.在美国,有这样一个传统:当你吹灭生日蛋糕上的蜡烛的时候,就可以许一个愿望.

sentences.english: A cold breeze was blowing hard.
sentences.chinese: 寒风劲吹。

sentences.english: It was blowing from an easterly direction.
sentences.chinese: 这是从东面吹过来的。

sentences.english: Outside, the weather was blowing a gale.
sentences.chinese: 外面狂风大作。

sentences.english: Her hair was blowing in the breeze.
sentences.chinese: 她的头发在微风中飘扬。

sentences.english: The whistle blew for half time.
sentences.chinese: 哨声响起，上半场结束。

detailed_translations.english: if the wind or a current of air blows, it moves

sentences.english: I blew out the candle.
sentences.chinese: 我吹灭了蜡烛。

detailed_translations.english: If you blow out a flame or a candle, you blow at it so that it stops burning

sentences.english: We’ll stay at home if it rains.
sentences.chinese: 如果下雨，我们就待在家里。

sentences.english: If you need money, I can lend you some.
sentences.chinese: 如果你需要钱，我能借给你一些。

sentences.english: If I didn’t apologize, I’d feel guilty.
sentences.chinese: 如果我不道歉，我会感到内疚。

sentences.english: If you had worked harder, you would have passed your exams.
sentences.chinese: 要是你再努力一点，就通过考试了。

sentences.english: What would happen to your family if you were to die in an accident?
sentences.chinese: 要是你在意外事故中身亡，你的家人会怎么样呢？

sentences.english: If Dad were here, he would know what to do.
sentences.chinese: 如果爸爸在这儿，他会知道怎么做的。

sentences.english: Taste the soup and add salt and pepper if necessary.
sentences.chinese: 尝一下汤，需要的话加一点盐和胡椒粉。

sentences.english: I want to get back by five o’clock if possible.
sentences.chinese: 如果可能的话，我想5点之前回来。

sentences.english: I think I can fix it tomorrow. If not, you’ll have to wait till Friday.
sentences.chinese: 我想明天我能修好它，如果不行，你只好等到周五了。

sentences.english: Is the book available, and if so, where?
sentences.chinese: 有没有这本书？ 如果有的话，在哪儿？

sentences.english: The missiles can be fired only if the operator types in a six-digit code.
sentences.chinese: 只有在操作员输入一组六位数密码后，导弹才能发射。

sentences.english: We’ll face that problem if and when it comes along (= if it happens or when it happens ).
sentences.chinese: 如果这一问题真的发生了，我们就要面对它。

sentences.english: If by any chance you can’t manage dinner tonight, perhaps we can at least have a drink together.
sentences.chinese: 万一你今晚不能来吃饭，或许我们至少可以一起喝一杯。

detailed_translations.english: used when talking about something that might happen or be true, or might have happened

name: will
trans: 将，会，要（用于构成将来时）

sentences.english: A meeting will be held next Tuesday at 3 p.m.
sentences.chinese: 下星期二下午3点将召开一个会议。

sentences.english: What time will she arrive?
sentences.chinese: 她什么时候到达？

sentences.english: I hope they won’t be late.
sentences.chinese: 我希望他们不会迟到。

sentences.english: Maybe by then you will have changed your mind.
sentences.chinese: 也许到那时你已经改变主意了。

sentences.english: All right, I'll forgive you.
sentences.chinese: 好吧，我愿意原谅你。

detailed_translations.chinese: 将，会，要〔用于构成将来时〕
detailed_translations.english: used to make future tenses
determination to do something that you have decided to do, even if this is difficult

detailed_translations.chinese: 设法用意志力驱使〔某事发生〕
detailed_translations.english: You use will to say that someone is willing to do something. You use will not or won't to indicate that someone refuses to do something.

sentences.english: It is not known if they will return to the UK for the child's birth .
sentences.chinese: 现在还不知道他们是否会为了孩子的出生而回到英国。

sentences.english: ...a piece of candy.
sentences.chinese: …一块糖果。

detailed_translations.chinese: 用糖煮；使结晶为砂糖；美化
糖果（等于sweets）；冰糖（等于sugar candy，rock candy）；毒品
detailed_translations.english: Candy is sweet foods such as chocolate or toffees

detailed_translations.chinese: 新潮的（服饰）；甜言蜜语的

sentences.english: I didn’t really know your name – it was just a lucky guess.
sentences.chinese: 我并不知道你的名字―只是运气好猜中的。

sentences.english: a lucky charm
sentences.chinese: 吉祥符

detailed_translations.english: having good luck

sentences.english: Hilary was popular at school.
sentences.chinese: 希拉里在学校里很受欢迎。

sentences.english: a popular holiday resort
sentences.chinese: 人们喜欢的度假胜地

sentences.english: Coffee is probably the most popular drink in the world.
sentences.chinese: 咖啡很可能是世界上最受欢迎的饮料。

sentences.english: a popular movement for democracy
sentences.chinese: 争取民主的全民运动

detailed_translations.english: liked by a lot of people

sentences.english: Halve the tomatoes, then cut them up coarsely.
sentences.chinese: 把西红柿切成两半，然后再把它们粗略切一下。

detailed_translations.english: If you cut something up, you cut it into several pieces

sentences.english: You should talk to Ken – he's always full of good ideas.
sentences.chinese: 你应该和肯谈谈，他总是满脑子好主意。

sentences.english: I knew it was a bad idea to leave him on his own.
sentences.chinese: 我知道把他独自留下不是个好主意。

sentences.english: It was my wife’s idea to move house.
sentences.chinese: 要搬家是我妻子的主意。

sentences.english: He has some very strange ideas about education.
sentences.chinese: 他对教育有些非常奇怪的看法。

detailed_translations.english: a plan or suggestion for a possible course of action, especially one that you think of suddenly

sentences.english: a bottle of milk
sentences.chinese: 一瓶奶

sentences.english: Would you like some milk in your tea?
sentences.chinese: 你茶里要加点奶吗？

sentences.english: a pint of semi-skimmed milk
sentences.chinese: 一品脱半脱脂奶

sentences.english: I helped to milk the cows.
sentences.chinese: 我帮忙挤牛奶。

detailed_translations.english: a white liquid produced by cows or goats that is drunk by people
to take milk from a cow or goat

sentences.english: Our cow is carrying again.
sentences.chinese: 我家的母牛又怀胎了。

sentences.english: The cow is expected to calve next week.
sentences.chinese: 这头母牛预期下周生小牛。

sentences.english: The cow cast a calf.
sentences.chinese: 这头母牛早产了。

detailed_translations.english: a large female animal that is kept on farms and used to produce milk or meat

sentences.english: After unveiling a cornerstone of a cooperation center for modern dairy technology in the farm, Olmert tried to milk a cow with milking machines.
sentences.chinese: 在参加了农场现代化奶制品技术合作中心的奠基仪式之后，奥尔默特尝试了用挤奶器挤牛奶。

sentences.english: a horse and cart
sentences.chinese: 一辆马车

sentences.english: Lee had never ridden a horse before.
sentences.chinese: 李以前从未骑过马。

detailed_translations.english: a large strong animal that people ride and use for pulling heavy things

sentences.english: I didn't know my times tables but I could milk a goat and ride a horse.
sentences.chinese: 我不知道乘法口诀表，但我知道如何给山羊挤奶和骑马。

sentences.english: Adventure advice: You can also ride a horse. Mongolia has the most horses per person in the world.
sentences.chinese: 探险建议：你也可以骑马。蒙古是世界上每人拥有马匹数目最多的地方。

sentences.english: Whether you’re interested in Western- or English-style horseback riding, some simple information can help you learn to ride a horse fast.
sentences.chinese: 无论你是对美国西部的还是英式的骑马方式感兴趣，以下简单的提示可以让你快速的学会骑马。

sentences.english: Have you fed the cat?
sentences.chinese: 你喂猫了吗？

detailed_translations.english: to give food to a person or animal

sentences.english: Do you have to feed plants like you feed chickens?
sentences.chinese: 你必须像喂小鸡那样养育植物吗?。

sentences.english: The fun never stops as you grow grass, feed chickens, collect eggs and take your produce to market.
sentences.chinese: 这项活动从未停止，你种草，饲料鸡，收集鸡蛋，把你的产品推向市场。

sentences.english: Do you have to feed the plants as we feed chickens ?
sentences.chinese: 你是像喂鸡那样给植物施肥吗？

sentences.english: She dickered with the farmer for the best fruit.
sentences.chinese: 她要买最好的水果而跟农民讨价还价。

sentences.english: The farmer peddled his fruit from house to house.
sentences.chinese: 那个农民挨家挨户兜售他的水果。

sentences.english: As a farmer, you should learn how to yoke the oxen together.
sentences.chinese: 作为农民，你应该学会怎样把一对牛用轭连起来。

sentences.english: I’m sorry. That’s quite impossible.
sentences.chinese: 我很抱歉，那是完全不可能的。

sentences.english: I felt quite bitter about it at the time.
sentences.chinese: 当时我对此感到相当痛苦。

sentences.english: Well, actually it requires quite a bit of work and research.
sentences.chinese: 呃，实际上这需要相当多的工作和研究。

sentences.english: I can see it quite clearly.
sentences.chinese: 我能清清楚楚地看见它。

detailed_translations.english: completely

name: anything
trans: （常用于否定句或疑问句）任何东西；任何事物

sentences.english: You can buy anything you want.
sentences.chinese: 你想要什么都可以买。

sentences.english: He was prepared to do anything to make a bit of money.
sentences.chinese: 只要能赚一点钱，他什么都愿意做。

sentences.english: Anything would be better than staying at home!
sentences.chinese: 做什么都比待在家里好！

sentences.english: You can write about swimming, skiing, or anything else you enjoy doing.
sentences.chinese: 你可以写游泳、写滑雪或者其他任何你喜欢的活动。

detailed_translations.english: any thing, event, situation etc, when it is not important to say exactly which

sentences.english: Support for Mr Thompson is growing.
sentences.chinese: 汤普森先生的支持率在上升。

sentences.english: a tree which will grow well in most types of soil
sentences.chinese: 在大部分土壤里都能生长得很好的一种树

detailed_translations.english: to become bigger, taller etc over a period of time in the process of becoming an adult

sentences.english: a 300-hectare farm
sentences.chinese: 一座300公顷的农场

sentences.english: farm workers
sentences.chinese: 农场工人

sentences.english: farm animals
sentences.chinese: 农场牲畜

sentences.english: Joe had worked on the farm all his life.
sentences.chinese: 乔在农场干了一辈子。

detailed_translations.english: an area of land used for growing crops or keeping animals

sentences.english: The Roman Swiss Army knife has a knife, spoon, fork, spike, spatula, and small pick.
sentences.chinese: 这种古罗马瑞士军刀包含了刀，勺，叉，长钉，抹刀和小鹤嘴锄。

detailed_translations.english: a  pickaxe

sentences.english: an excellent suggestion
sentences.chinese: 极好的建议

sentences.english: His car is in excellent condition.
sentences.chinese: 他的汽车状况极佳。

sentences.english: Second-hand computers can be excellent value.
sentences.chinese: 二手计算机买得好会非常合算。

detailed_translations.english: extremely good or of very high quality

sentences.english: The house had lovely views over open countryside .
sentences.chinese: 这房子望出去是开阔的乡村美景。

detailed_translations.chinese: 农村，乡下；乡下的全体居民
detailed_translations.english: land that is outside cities and towns

sentences.english: It (so) chanced that I was in the countryside at the time.
sentences.chinese: 那时我恰巧在乡下。

sentences.english: yesterday’s meeting
sentences.chinese: 昨天的会议

sentences.english: They arrived the day before yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 他们前天到的。

detailed_translations.english: the day before today
on or during the day before today

sentences.english: a lovely rose bush with delicate pink flowers
sentences.chinese: 一簇开着娇嫩的粉红色花朵的美丽蔷薇

sentences.english: fields full of beautiful wild flowers
sentences.chinese: 开满美丽野花的田野

sentences.english: It was May, and the apple trees were all in flower.
sentences.chinese: 那是个5月，苹果树开满了花。

detailed_translations.english: a coloured or white part that a plant or tree produces before fruit or seeds

sentences.english: He’s been a constant source of worry .
sentences.chinese: 他总是让人担心。

detailed_translations.english: the feeling of being anxious about something
to be anxious or unhappy about someone or something, so that you think about them a lot

sentences.english: Luckily the museum was not damaged by the earthquake.
sentences.chinese: 幸好，博物馆没有在地震中遭到破坏。

detailed_translations.english: used to say that it is good that something happened or was done because if it had not, the situation would be unpleasant or difficult

sentences.english: The sky was blue and the sun was shining.
sentences.chinese: 天空蔚蓝，阳光明媚。

detailed_translations.english: the large bright object in the sky that gives us light and heat, and around which the Earth moves
to sit or lie outside when the sun is shining

sentences.english: the Museum of Modern Art
sentences.chinese: 现代艺术博物馆

sentences.english: The museum has an extensive collection of early photographs.
sentences.chinese: 这座博物馆藏有大量早期的照片。

detailed_translations.english: a building where important  cultural, historical, or scientific objects are kept and shown to the public

sentences.english: The warehouse was completely destroyed by fire.
sentences.chinese: 仓库全给烧毁了。

sentences.english: Thirty people died in a fire in downtown Chicago.
sentences.chinese: 30人死于芝加哥市中心的一场火灾。

sentences.english: Police think that the fire was started deliberately.
sentences.chinese: 警方认为有人故意纵火。

sentences.english: Rioters set fire to a whole row of stores (= made them start burning ) .
sentences.chinese: 暴徒纵火焚烧了一整排商店。

sentences.english: Soldiers fired on the crowd.
sentences.chinese: 士兵朝人群开枪。

detailed_translations.english: uncontrolled flames, light, and heat that destroy and damage things
to shoot bullets or bombs

sentences.english: The bulb, which hangs idly about in a fire station in Livermore, California, holds the Guinness World Record.
sentences.chinese: 这只悠闲的挂在加州利物浦的一个消防站的灯泡，拥有了一项吉尼斯世界纪录。

sentences.english: This study correlates the amount of fire damage in major residential fires to their distance from the nearest fire station.
sentences.chinese: 这个研究将主要住宅区火灾损失的金额与它们到最近消防站的距离关联起来。

detailed_translations.english: a building where the equipment used to stop fires burning is kept, and where  firefighters  stay until they are needed

sentences.english: a collection of valuable paintings
sentences.chinese: 一批珍贵的画作

sentences.english: Can you help me hang this painting (= put it on a wall ) ?
sentences.chinese: 你帮我把这幅画挂起来好吗？

sentences.english: painting and decorating
sentences.chinese: 油漆和装潢

detailed_translations.english: a picture that has been painted

name: exciting
trans: 使人兴奋的；令人激动的

sentences.english: an exciting discovery
sentences.chinese: 激动人心的发现

sentences.english: ‘Julia and Paul are getting married!’ ‘Oh, how exciting!’
sentences.chinese: “朱莉娅和保罗要结婚了！”“啊，太让人兴奋了！”

sentences.english: I’ve got some very exciting news for you.
sentences.chinese: 我给你带来了一些很激动人心的消息。

sentences.english: Let’s do something exciting.
sentences.chinese: 我们来做些让人振奋的事情吧。

sentences.english: Melanie finds her work exciting and rewarding.
sentences.chinese: 梅拉妮觉得自己的工作既刺激又有意义。

detailed_translations.english: making you feel excited

sentences.english: She had a lovely face.
sentences.chinese: 她有一张漂亮的脸蛋。

sentences.english: What a lovely house!
sentences.chinese: 多么漂亮的房子啊！

sentences.english: You look lovely in that dress.
sentences.chinese: 你穿那条连衣裙很漂亮。

sentences.english: He was a lovely little boy.
sentences.chinese: 他是个可爱的小男孩。

sentences.english: What a lovely day!
sentences.chinese: 多好的天气啊！

sentences.english: Thank you for a lovely evening.
sentences.chinese: 谢谢你让我们度过了一个美好的夜晚。

detailed_translations.english: beautiful or attractive

sentences.english: the most expensive restaurant in town
sentences.chinese: 城里最贵的餐馆

sentences.english: Petrol is becoming more and more expensive.
sentences.chinese: 汽油越来越贵了。

sentences.english: Photography is an expensive hobby.
sentences.chinese: 摄影是一项很花钱的业余爱好。

sentences.english: For low-income families, children’s safety equipment can be prohibitively expensive (= so expensive that most people cannot afford it ).
sentences.chinese: 对于低收入家庭来说，儿童的安全设备贵得让人望而却步。

sentences.english: Employing the wrong builder can be a horribly expensive mistake.
sentences.chinese: 用错建筑工人有时会是代价高昂的错误。

sentences.english: Her husband had expensive tastes (= liked expensive things ).
sentences.chinese: 她丈夫喜欢的东西都很贵。

detailed_translations.english: costing a lot of money

sentences.english: cheap rail fares
sentences.chinese: 便宜的火车票

sentences.english: the cheapest TV on the market
sentences.chinese: 市场上最便宜的电视机

sentences.english: Property is cheaper in Spain than here.
sentences.chinese: 西班牙的房地产比这里便宜。

sentences.english: a cheap shop (= one that sells goods cheaply )
sentences.chinese: 廉价商店

sentences.english: The equipment is relatively cheap and simple to use.
sentences.chinese: 这种设备相对比较便宜，而且操作简单。

sentences.english: Cheap wine gives me a headache.
sentences.chinese: 我喝劣质的葡萄酒会头痛。

detailed_translations.english: not at all expensive, or lower in price than you expected

sentences.english: The car was travelling at a very slow speed.
sentences.chinese: 汽车正以非常慢的速度行驶。

sentences.english: a slow walker
sentences.chinese: 慢慢走着的人

sentences.english: The economy faces a year of slower growth.
sentences.chinese: 经济将面临增长更缓慢的一年。

sentences.english: Take a few deep, slow breaths.
sentences.chinese: 慢慢地深吸几口气。

sentences.english: I began to walk slower and slower.
sentences.chinese: 我开始走得越来越慢。

detailed_translations.english: not moving, being done, or happening quickly
In informal English, slower is used to mean "at a slower speed" and slowest is used to mean "at the slowest speed." In nonstandard English, slow is used to mean "with little speed."

sentences.english: a fast car
sentences.chinese: 速度很快的汽车

sentences.english: That can’t be the time - my watch must be fast.
sentences.chinese: 不可能是这个时间——一定是我的表快了。

sentences.english: Slow down – you’re driving too fast.
sentences.chinese: 慢点——你开得太快了。

detailed_translations.english: moving or able to move quickly
moving quickly

sentences.english: cars built by robots
sentences.chinese: 机器人制造的汽车

detailed_translations.english: a machine that can move and do some of the work of a person, and is usually controlled by a computer

sentences.english: a tour guide
sentences.chinese: 导游

sentences.english: an experienced mountain guide
sentences.chinese: 一位有经验的登山向导

sentences.english: We were guided around the museums.
sentences.chinese: 我们在导游的带领下参观了博物馆。

detailed_translations.english: someone whose job is to take tourists to a place and show them around
to show sb the way to a place, often by going with them

sentences.english: The earrings were a gift from my aunt.
sentences.chinese: 这副耳环是我姑姑送给我的礼物。

sentences.english: The clock was given as a retirement gift when he left the police.
sentences.chinese: 这个钟表是他退休离开警局时收到的礼物。

sentences.english: expensive wedding gifts
sentences.chinese: 昂贵的结婚礼物

sentences.english: Enjoy a free gift with any purchase of $20 or more.
sentences.chinese: 购物满20美元奉送礼品一份。

sentences.english: This excellent cookbook would make an ideal gift for anyone just going away to college.
sentences.chinese: 这本精美的烹饪书送给要离家上大学的人是很好的礼物。

sentences.english: a gift for languages
sentences.chinese: 语言天赋

detailed_translations.english: something that you give someone, for example to thank them or because you like them, especially on a special occasion

sentences.english: All in all, it had been one of the most miserable days of Henry’s life.
sentences.chinese: 总的说来，这是亨利一生中最痛苦的日子之一。

sentences.english: Everything was covered in a thick layer of dust.
sentences.chinese: 所有东西上面都蒙着厚厚一层灰。

sentences.english: I decided to tell her everything.
sentences.chinese: 我决定把一切都告诉她。

sentences.english: Apart from the bus arriving late, everything else seemed to be going according to plan.
sentences.chinese: 除了公共汽车晚点之外，其他一切似乎都在按计划进行。

detailed_translations.english: each thing or all things

sentences.english: I wasn’t sure if he was really interested or if he was just being polite.
sentences.chinese: 我不敢肯定他是真的感兴趣，还是出于礼貌而已。

detailed_translations.chinese: 感兴趣的；有权益的；有成见的
detailed_translations.english: giving a lot of attention to something because you want to find out more about it or because you enjoy it

sentences.english: And why should anyone be interested in listening to our cough?
sentences.chinese: 凭什么会有人感兴趣来听我们的咳嗽呢？

sentences.english: We would not be interested in human beings if we did not have the hope of someday meeting someone worse off than ourselves.
sentences.chinese: 如果我们没有在某天碰到某位比我们更糟糕的人，这种念头的话，我们还会对人类感兴趣吗？

sentences.english: Many people in the organization or community would be interested in these documents, so you need a way to manage such users and their access.
sentences.chinese: 组织或社区中的很多人都可能对这些文档感兴趣，所以需要有一种方式来管理那些用户和他们的访问。

sentences.english: The church was dark and quiet.
sentences.chinese: 教堂里黑魆魆的，寂静无声。

sentences.english: the dark winter days
sentences.chinese: 阴暗的冬日

sentences.english: Suddenly, the room went dark (= became dark ) .
sentences.chinese: 房间突然变暗了。

sentences.english: (= night begins ) about ten o’clock.
sentences.chinese: 大约十点钟开始天黑。

sentences.english: It was still dark (= was night ) when we boarded the train.
sentences.chinese: 我们上火车时天还是黑的。

sentences.english: It was pitch dark (= completely dark ) in the attic.
sentences.chinese: 阁楼上漆黑一片。

detailed_translations.english: if it is dark, there is little or no light

name: hear
trans: 听到；听见(过去式，过去分词 heard）

sentences.english: Blanche heard a crash as the back door was flung open.
sentences.chinese: 布兰奇听见后门哗啦一声被推开。

sentences.english: Did anyone see or hear anything last night?
sentences.chinese: 昨晚有没有人看见或听见什么？

sentences.english: Old Zeke doesn’t hear too well any more.
sentences.chinese: 老齐克的耳朵已不灵了。

sentences.english: I heard a rumor that he was getting married soon.
sentences.chinese: 我听到传闻，说他马上要结婚了。

sentences.english: The Supreme Court heard the case on Tuesday.
sentences.chinese: 最高法院于周二审理了此案。

detailed_translations.english: to know that a sound is being made, using your ears

sentences.english: Let’s go back to camp – it’s getting dark.
sentences.chinese: 我们回营地吧，天快黑了。

sentences.english: a camp near Lake Ellen Wilson
sentences.chinese: 埃伦•威尔逊湖边的营地

sentences.english: The soldiers broke camp (= took down their tents etc ) and left before dawn.
sentences.chinese: 士兵们在黎明前拔营出发了。

sentences.english: We set up camp (= made the camping place ready ) at nearby Icicle Lake.
sentences.chinese: 我们在附近的冰柱湖边建了营地。

sentences.english: The expedition’s base camp (= main camp ) was 6,000 feet below the summit.
sentences.chinese: 探险队的大本营在山峰下面6,000英尺处。

detailed_translations.english: a place where people stay in tents, shelters etc for a short time, usually in the mountains, a forest etc
to set up a tent or shelter and stay there for a short time

sentences.english: Lake Michigan
sentences.chinese: 密歇根湖

detailed_translations.english: a large area of water surrounded by land

sentences.english: a sandy beach
sentences.chinese: 沙滩

sentences.english: surfers on the beach
sentences.chinese: 沙滩上的冲浪者

detailed_translations.english: an area of sand or small stones at the edge of the sea or a lake

sentences.english: Can I try you new badminton racket?
sentences.chinese: 我可以试用你的羽毛球拍吗？

sentences.english: I like playing basketball and  badminton.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢的篮球和羽毛球。

sentences.english: My friend and I take part in sports like tennis,badminton and swimming.
sentences.chinese: 我和我的朋友参加体育运动如打网球,羽毛球和游泳.

detailed_translations.english: a game that is similar to tennis but played with a  shuttlecock (=  small feathered object  )  instead of a ball

sentences.english: Sheep were grazing on the hillside.
sentences.chinese: 羊群在山坡上吃草。

sentences.english: a sheep farmer
sentences.chinese: 养羊的农民

detailed_translations.english: a farm animal that is kept for its wool and its meat

sentences.english: I saw Peter as I was getting off the bus.
sentences.chinese: 我下公共汽车的时候看见了彼得。

sentences.english: As time passed, things seemed to get worse.
sentences.chinese: 随着时间的推移，情况似乎变得更加糟糕了。

sentences.english: Just as the two men were leaving, a message arrived.
sentences.chinese: 那两个男子刚要离开，消息就传来了。

detailed_translations.english: while or when

sentences.english: the study of the natural world
sentences.chinese: 对自然界的研究

sentences.english: an area of spectacular natural beauty
sentences.chinese: 自然风景秀丽的地区

sentences.english: death from natural causes
sentences.chinese: 自然死亡

sentences.english: the need for natural light in offices
sentences.chinese: 办公室里需要自然光的照射

detailed_translations.english: existing in nature and not caused, made, or controlled by people

sentences.english: Butterflies and moths are attracted to the wild flowers.
sentences.chinese: 蝴蝶和飞蛾为野花所吸引。

detailed_translations.english: a type of insect that has large wings, often with beautiful colours

sentences.english: Times Square attracts more than 30 million visitors annually.

sentences.chinese: 我16岁时离家出走。

sentences.chinese: 如果她来，她会大吃一惊。

sentences.chinese: 刚开始时他非常害怕。

sentences.chinese: 有那么多的事情要做，我都不知道从哪里开始。

sentences.chinese: 这些猫跳下来，过来迎接我们。

sentences.chinese: 自动扶梯天天送我们上上下下。

sentences.chinese: 她醒来时，阳光泻入窗内。

sentences.chinese: 到办公室里来。

sentences.chinese: 他把手插进大衣口袋里。

sentences.chinese: 我们跳进海里。

sentences.chinese: 热带森林

sentences.chinese: 发生森林火灾的危险

sentences.chinese: 她把头发拢到耳朵背后。
